items.text:
Create an ultra-realistic 9:16 winter Christmas portrait of an Asian woman. (Use my same facial features exactly — 100% identical face shape, eyes, nose, lips, ears, and hairstyle from the reference photo.)

Hairstyle must match the uploaded image exactly.

Subject & Pose:
Almost full-body, sitting outside a café on the floor or a soft cushion in front of the entrance window.
Head gently tilted upward, looking up or slightly sideways.
One hand extended to catch falling snowflakes.
Soft, dreamy, cozy expression with a subtle cheerful Korean winter mood.

Makeup & Face (K-Beauty Winter):
Fair porcelain skin with a cool icy glow.
Smooth glass-skin luminosity.
Subtle aegyo-sal under the eyes.
Dark brown eyes with a gentle upward/distant gaze.
Cool pink/peach gradient eyeshadow.
Thin eyeliner, natural doll-like lashes.
Soft cool-pink winter flush.
Natural pale-pink glossy lips slightly brightened.

Outfit:
Thick white/cream knitted winter set.
Ribbed long-sleeve sweater.
Matching knit bottom.

Accessories:
Large burgundy or deep-red chunky knit scarf wrapped multiple times.

Background & Atmosphere:
She sits OUTSIDE the café.
Behind her through a large glass window:
Decorated Christmas tree.
Warm golden fairy lights.
Red/gold ornaments and garlands.
Cozy warm interior visible inside.
Natural reflections on the glass.
Dark wooden café frames visible.
Heavy snowfall outside around her.

Environment & Weather:
Moderate–heavy falling snow.
Snowflakes settling on her hair, scarf, shoulders.
Cool, crisp outdoor lighting contrasted with warm indoor glow.

Lighting:
Cool soft winter ambient light on the model.
Warm golden café illumination behind the window.
Korean-style contrast: cool foreground + warm background.
Natural highlights on face, hair, scarf.

Color Palette:
White, cream, icy blue, cool gray.
Warm gold, red, brown from the café interior.
Korean Christmas winter aesthetic.

Style:
Cozy, cinematic Korean winter lifestyle photography.
Ultra-realistic Christmas snowfall portrait with a dreamy emotional tone.

Ultra-realistic 8K close-up, right side profile of the uploaded woman's face (100% accurate, no distortion). Standing amidst falling snow, wearing a large black fur coat dusted with snowflakes, with a black scarf. Long dark brown wavy hair, soft, with light snow clinging to strand. Pale reddish-pink lips, retaining lip texture details. The atmosphere is moody and ethereal
Lighting & color tone: cold light, subtle blue-grey tone, soft, diffuse light, no harsh light source; facial area sufficiently lit to show skin texture, subtle natural shadows on the nose and cheekbones. Calm, silent expression, eyes half-open. High-detail texture on the coat, High-contrast shadows emphasizing cheekbones. Shot with a professional DSLR lens in soft natural light.

Ultra-realistic 8K close-up, frontal view of the uploaded woman's face (100% accurate, no distortion). Standing amidst falling snow, wearing a large black fur coat dusted with snowflakes, with a black scarf. Long dark brown wavy hair, soft, with light snow clinging to strand. Pale reddish-pink lips, retaining lip texture details. The atmosphere is moody and ethereal. Lighting & color tone: cold light, subtle blue-grey tone, soft, diffuse light, no harsh light source; facial area sufficiently lit to show skin texture, subtle natural shadows on the nose and cheekbones. The person stands confidently with hands in their coat pockets, head slightly tilted up, gentle smile, giving a calm and thoughtful demeanor. High-detail texture on the coat, hairs. Shot with a professional DSLR lens in soft natural light

Close-up portrait of a young East Asian female model, showcasing a chic, minimalist style. She is dressed in an off-white, off-the-shoulder blouse with intricate shirred or ruched long sleeves. Her dark hair is styled in a loose, low bun, with fine flyaways subtly framing her delicate features. Her makeup is fresh and radiant, featuring a natural complexion, understated eyeliner, long curled eyelashes, and a soft coral-pink lip. She wears a single round pearl earring and elegant gold rings. Her hands are gracefully positioned near her face, with fingers lightly touching her temple and cheek. The camera captures her at eye-level with soft, even illumination against a clean, diffused light background, ultra realistic, 4k, high detail, photorealistic, sharp focus, highest quality, preserve original facial features

Change the style of the uploaded subject and keep the face, create crazy messy long hair, 3/4 angle with natural water droplets on the face and bare shoulders showing artistic sun rays.
Half of the subject's face is in deep shadow, the other half is brightly lit. Deep black eyes, expressive, intense atmosphere. Cinematic composition, dark background with high contrast between light and dark. Shot in ultra high resolution makes for a dramatic and striking portrait.

Using the image given , create A photo of a young girl sitting elegantly on the floor , infront of a big vintage mirror in a soft afternoon golden hour, her left hand touching her cheek gracefullt while her right hand taking herself a mirror-selfie using her Iphone 15. The light from the sunset from the window shines on her giving some ethereal mood. She has a long wavy dark brown hair with bangs windswept strands falling across her.She wears soft natural makeup with glossy lips. She is wearing light wash high-waisted denim short and a white cropped tank top. Over her shoulders and arms, replace the cardigan with an oversized burnt dark brown knit cardigan featuring cable-knit patterns, embroidered stars and her initials B.B. im silver , slightly falls over on her shoulder exposing her smooth skin and curves. She leans forward to the mirror with poise and confidence

Create ultra-high-resolution 8K photo-realistic images of the original person (100% exact facial likeness, no alterations)
Close-up artistic portrait, with the female subject's face replaced by my face, keeping all facial features intact.
Long hair is gently flowing, naturally messy, brown color.
Natural cool-toned light shines from behind and the left, highlighting the fair skin.
Plump pink-red lips, eyes slightly half-closed, a captivating and dreamy gaze.
Brown strapless top (áo cúp ngực).
Pose: Head is slightly tilted to the right. The gaze is gentle.
The background is slightly dark, minimalist, to emphasize the face and the mysterious aura.
Photo style: 'White Moonlight' (bạch nguyệt quang), romantic, soft, and full of cinematic quality.

Keep the facial features from the uploaded image. An ultra-sharp 8k studio portrait of a beautiful young East Asian woman,, with long, dark, wavy hair,. thin and light colored eyebrows.
Pose/Expression: She is looking slightly off-camera with a serene, perhaps contemplative or slightly melancholic expression. Her head is tilted slightly. She wore an 1 oversized black sweater, that left her shoulders bare, suggesting a topless or off-the-shoulder look, drawing attention to her face and hair.
Hair: Long, dark, and voluminous. It's styled with a natural, slightly windswept or ethereal look, with individual strands catching the light and some appearing to float around her face and head.
Makeup: Natural and subtle. allowing her natural features to stand out.
Background: Very clean yellow, almost white, and completely out of focus, serving to isolate the subject and emphasize the dramatic lighting.
Lighting: studio light The light highlighted her face. Dramatic and artistic. The primary light source is coming from above and slightly behind her, creating a halo effect on her hair and strong highlights on her forehead, nose bridge, and cheekbones. There's also some fill light on her face, but the overall impression is of a moody, low-key lighting setup. The light makes her hair appear to have a soft glow and some strands seem to float.
Atmosphere/Mood: Ethereal, dreamy, mysterious, delicate, and elegant.
Composition: A close-up portrait, focusing on her face, hair, and shoulders. The framing is tight, emphasizing intimacy.
Style: beauty portraiture with a slightly fantastical or ethereal touch.

Ultra-realistic 8K fashion studio portrait of a woman with wavy brunette hair, posing confidently against a clean white background.
Pose: seated with one elbow resting on her knee, her hand supporting her chin, and her gaze directed toward the camera — calm, confident, and slightly introspective.
Outfit: oversized dark brown pinstripe suit with structured shoulders, wide sleeves, and matching trousers, modern look.
Hair: voluminous soft waves framing her face naturally, with loose strands adding movement and texture.
Makeup: glowing natural skin, warm bronze highlight, peach lips, soft contour, and defined brows — understated yet radiant beauty.
Lighting: bright, even studio lighting emphasizing facial structure, texture, and the smooth contrast between her skin tone and the dark suit.
Background: minimal pure white backdrop creating a clean, editorial aesthetic and directing full attention to the subject.
Mood: sophisticated, confident, and contemporary — exuding quiet power and feminine poise.
Aesthetic: high-fashion editorial photography, minimalist color palette, crisp tones, Vogue-style portrait composition.
Maintain 100% of the facial features and appearance of the person from the original photo, do not change any details.

Ultra-realistic cinematic close-up portrait of a beautiful young Vietnamese woman in profile, with long black hair slightly messy and soft strands falling across her face. Her skin is smooth and pale, with natural blush on her cheeks and soft pink lips. She gazes gently upward with a dreamy, melancholic expression.
Lighting: soft diffused daylight from a side window, creating gentle highlights on her cheek and lips, subtle shadows along her jawline, and a delicate cinematic glow.
Background: minimal neutral indoor backdrop with shallow depth of field, creamy bokeh that enhances focus on her face.
Mood: quiet, emotional, introspective — evoking a tender and poetic feeling.
Camera: close-up side profile portrait shot, cinematic 85mm lens effect, shallow depth of field, ultra-detailed focus on eyelashes, skin texture, and lips.
Quality: ultra-detailed 8K realism, soft HDR tone, photorealistic skin texture, cinematic lighting and color grading.

Hyperrealistic, ultra-detailed close-up portrait of a young woman looking over her shoulder towards the camera, captured with an intense flash and a grainy film effect. She has long, wavy dark hair styled in a half-up ponytail, adorned with a prominent white satin bow at the top. Soft bangs frame her forehead. Her makeup is polished and luminous, featuring soft blush on her cheeks, defined eyebrows, subtle eyeliner, and glossy lips. She has large, expressive eyes. A sparkling, snowflake-like earring is visible on her left ear, and a delicate necklace chain is around her neck. She is wearing a light pink, possibly shimmery or sequined, strapless top or dress. The garment appears to have some textured or ruched details, with visible lacing or a corset-like detail on the side or back, as well as separate armbands or off-shoulder sleeves in the same material. The lighting from the intense flash creates sharp highlights on her skin and the fabric, emphasizing textures, while the grainy film effect adds a raw, textured, and slightly retro quality to the image. The background is softly lit and indistinct, suggesting an indoor setting with light-colored walls or surfaces. Use photo reference for facial features.
